itunes:title: #104: The 12-Step Experience for Sex and Love Addicts
title: #104: The 12-Step Experience for Sex and Love Addicts
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Personally speaking, my experience with the 12-step philosophy for sex and love addicts was so healing and helpful. You might not be aware, but there are sex and love addicts anonymous programs that provide great transformation and inspiration when...
itunes:summary:
Personally speaking, my experience with the 12-step philosophy for sex and love addicts was so healing and helpful. You might not be aware, but there are sex and love addicts anonymous programs that provide great transformation and inspiration when done well.

 

In today’s episode, I’m sharing my experience and my story going through the 12-step method for sex and love addicts. I share the transformations I experienced and the inspirations I’ve walked away with, allowing me to infuse a lot of the teachings and filling the gaps that needed to be filled in my work.

 

I hope this episode will give you more insight into my experience with sex and love addicts anonymous. Listen to my story and hear what you can expect if you’re looking to get invested in this yourself.

 

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • The Healed and Loved Woman Membership
  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Get our free download - The 5 Step Roadmap to Heal Love Addiction
  • Apply to work together in the Recovery School  - Click here to pre-apply!
  • Learn that YOU ARE WORTHY  - Enroll in You Are Worthy here
